fields.label: Disclaimer
fields.name: footer_disclaimer
fields.instructions: This is what will appear in the disclaimer section of the footer. When left blank it displays nothing.

fields.label: Enable?
fields.name: enable_fun_facts
fields.message: Yes, I want to show the fun fact section at the bottom of the page.

fields.label: Enable Bottom Gradient Overlay
fields.name: bottom_gradient_overlay
fields.message: Yes, I would like a gradient to display at the bottom of each slide.

fields.label: Slide transition speed (milliseconds)
fields.name: slide_transition_speed
fields.instructions: This is the amount of time it takes the transition of switching slides to play.

fields.label: Slide auto play length (milliseconds)
fields.name: slide_auto_play_length
fields.instructions: This is the amount of time that each slide will remain on the screen for.

sub_fields.label: Slide Video (Optional)
sub_fields.name: slide_video
sub_fields.instructions: Uploading a video will replace the slide image field.

fields.label: Content Area
fields.name: content_area
fields.instructions: This content will show above the leadership display.

fields.label: First Separation
fields.name: first_separation
fields.instructions: Select the category you would like to display at the upper half of the screen.

fields.label: Second Separation
fields.name: second_separation
fields.instructions: Select the category you would like to display at the lower half of the screen.

fields.label: Style Type
fields.name: style_type
fields.instructions: Please select the style you would like the leadership page to follow. The first has larger sections with bios to the right of each team members image, and the second uses a grid of team members.

sub_fields.label: Icon Name
sub_fields.name: icon_name
sub_fields.instructions: This is the font awesome icon name

fields.label: Enable Tray Menu
fields.name: enable_tray_menu
fields.message: Yes, I want to enable a tray menu

sub_fields.label: Has Dropdown Menu
sub_fields.name: has_dropdown_menu
sub_fields.message: Yes, this page item should have a dropdown menu

sub_fields.label: Enable Sub Menu
sub_fields.name: enable_sub_menu
sub_fields.message: Yes, I want a sub-menu for this section

fields.label: Split Image
fields.name: split_image
fields.instructions: Check this to have the image take up half a row, and a text paragraph take up the other half.
fields.message: Yes, I would like to have text to the side of my image.

fields.label: Split Text
fields.name: split_text
fields.instructions: This text will display to the side of the image only if the above checkbox is checked.

fields.label: Global Header Search Bar Font Color
fields.name: font_color_of_search_bar
fields.instructions: This field controls the color of search bar that's located in the header of the site. The default color is white (#FFFFFF)

fields.label: Projects Page Search Bar Font Color
fields.name: projects_page_search_bar_font_color

fields.label: Blog Page Sidebar Search Bar Font Color
fields.name: blog_search_color

fields.label: Enable Breadcrumbs?
fields.name: enable_breadcrumbs
fields.instructions: If checked, breadcrumbs will be displayed on all pages by default, but the section we remain target-able by YellowPencil so you'll still be able to disable it on individual pages.

fields.label: Pathways Style
fields.name: pathways_style
fields.instructions: select the style you would like to use to display the pathways.

fields.label: Dynamic Offer Title
fields.name: dynamic_offer_title
fields.instructions: This is the offer that automatically displays recent posts. To edit the title above the offer, use this field.

fields.label: Title Border
fields.name: title_border
fields.instructions: Show or hide the border under the Selected Clients title
